metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3061 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Found Linux Kernel flaw in the i740 driver. The Userspace program couldpass any values to the driver through ioctl() interface. The driver doesn'tcheck the value of 'pixclock', so it may cause a divide by zero error.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3061` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.2.0-20-generic - 5.19.0-21.21
